abstract: Heavy rains cause landslides in eastern Nepal that kill at least 21 people, trap others and leave dozens missing.
lead_paragraph: Heavy rains arriving with monsoon season were undermining hillsides, many of which may have been destabilized by a devastating April earthquake.

headline.main: Nepal Landslides Kill at Least 21, With Others Trapped or Missing
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Nepal: Landslides Kill at Least 21 People

snippet: Heavy rains arriving with monsoon season were undermining hillsides, many of which may have been destabilized by a devastating April earthquake.
